com.yourcompany.owcs.config
Class ExtendedAppContext

java.lang.Object
  com.fatwire.gst.foundation.controller.support.WebAppContext
      com.fatwire.gst.foundation.controller.action.support.DefaultWebAppContext
          com.fatwire.gst.foundation.groovy.context.GroovyWebContext
              com.yourcompany.owcs.config.ExtendedAppContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
FactoryProducer, AppContext
public class ExtendedAppContext
extends GroovyWebContext

A sample on how to extend the service factory in GSF. This class is an extension of the groovy app context, giving access to another ObjectFactory. This class needs to be registered to the file META-INF/gsf-contexts.

This class is also a show case on how services from Spring can be injected

Since:
6 sep. 2012
Author:
Dolf Dijkstra
